result.title: Bugs and mistakes
result.content:
Purpose

This category is ment to increase your awareness of your usual bugs and mistakes. If you note what you did wrong down , there are great chases you will improve it. This method is taken from my teacher and I observed efficency in it. Also you will see how others percieve mistake , which I think is also a good think.

This is also meant to create a thinking system. Try it ! It really helps.

What to note ?

Simply say what you should have done better in this day. Maybe you didn't read some lines of the statement , you stood a lot on supid bug or you start implementing way before you were ready. Just note it down and be sicere with yourself.
